trans-unit.source: Even after the wall was breached in half a dozen places, the phalanxes fought on, standing solidly against the onrushing raiders. Disciplined and dedicated, they held their ranks to the end, even in the face of tremendous losses.
trans-unit.target: 即使在城墙被攻破了五六处后，方阵兵团仍在力战，坚强地对抗著猛烈冲撞而来的突击队。训练有素且乐于献身的他们虽然伤亡惨重，却仍坚守阵地直到最后。
trans-unit.note: 简中第五版缺失了99张牌，这些牌仅出现在繁中第五版中。

trans-unit.source: Icatian Scout
trans-unit.target: 艾凯逊斥候

trans-unit.source: o1, oc\nT: Target creature gains first strike until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: o1，ocT：目标生物获得先攻异能直到回合结束。

trans-unit.source: "In these, our final days, I offer this. Though we could not save Icatia, we gave our children time to grow, and love, before it fell."\n—Ailis Connaut, diary
trans-unit.target: 在最后的这些日子中，这是我所能做的。虽然我们不能拯救艾凯逊，但在它沦陷之前，我们让我们的孩子有时间爱与成长。

trans-unit.source: Icatian Town
trans-unit.target: 艾凯逊镇

trans-unit.source: Put four Citizen tokens into play. Treat these tokens as 1/1 white creatures.
trans-unit.target: 放置四个市民衍生物进场。将这些衍生物视为1/1白色生物。

trans-unit.source: Icatia's once-peaceful towns faced increasing attacks from orcs and goblins as the climate cooled. By the time the empire fell, they were little more than armed camps.
trans-unit.target: 随著气候变冷，一度平和的艾凯森诸镇面对越来越多来自半兽人和鬼怪的攻击。到了帝国沦陷时，所剩下的只能算是有武装的营地。

trans-unit.source: Island Sanctuary
trans-unit.target: 避世岛

trans-unit.source: Skip drawing a card: Until the beginning of your next turn, only creatures with flying or islandwalk can attack you. Use this ability only during your draw phase and only once each turn.
trans-unit.target: 略过抓一张牌：直到你的下回合开始以前，只有具飞行或海岛行者异能的生物能够攻击你。你只能在抓牌阶段时使用此异能，并且每回合只能使用一次。

trans-unit.target: 「若你是名鬼怪，那么成为英雄并不须要向前进～只要别人都后退就成了！」 ～鬼怪老兵，比甘·富得洛

trans-unit.source: Goblin King
trans-unit.target: 鬼怪王

trans-unit.source: All Goblins get +1/+1 and gain mountainwalk. (If defending player controls any mountains, these creatures are unblockable.)
trans-unit.target: 所有鬼怪得到+1/+1及山脉行者异能。（若防御玩家操控任何山脉，则该生物不可被阻挡）

trans-unit.source: To be king, Numsgil did in Blog, who did in Unkful, who did in Viddle, who did in Loll, who did in Alrok . . . .
trans-unit.target: 为了成为国王，奴斯吉尔对布罗格作了布罗格对乌克富，乌克富对维多，维多对洛尔，以及洛尔对奥罗克所作的事。

trans-unit.source: Goblin War Drums
trans-unit.target: 鬼怪战鼓
trans-unit.note: 简中第五版缺失了99张牌，这些牌仅出现在繁中第五版中。

trans-unit.resname: 5ED·237 | Goblin War Drums | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Each creature you control cannot be blocked by only one creature.
trans-unit.target: 你所操控的每一只生物不能只被一只生物阻挡。
trans-unit.note: 简中第五版缺失了99张牌，这些牌仅出现在繁中第五版中。

trans-unit.source: "Goblins charge with a deafening war cry. The cry doesn't mean anything—it just drowns out the drums!"\n—Reod Dai, mercenary
trans-unit.target: 「鬼怪冲锋时会发出震耳欲聋的喊声，这喊声并没有任何意义～不过是把鼓声盖掉而已！」 ～佣兵雷欧·岱
trans-unit.note: 简中第五版缺失了99张牌，这些牌仅出现在繁中第五版中。

trans-unit.source: Goblin Warrens
trans-unit.target: 鬼怪繁殖地

trans-unit.target: o2oR，牺牲两只鬼怪：放三个鬼怪衍生物进场，将这些衍生物视为1/1红色生物。

trans-unit.source: "Goblins bred underground, their numbers hidden from the enemy until it was too late."\n—*Sarpadian Empires, vol. IV*
trans-unit.target: 「鬼怪繁殖于地下，它们躲过敌人的耳目直到多得藏不下。」 ～撒尔帕汀帝国，卷四

trans-unit.source: Hill Giant
trans-unit.target: 山丘巨人

trans-unit.source: Fortunately, hill giants have large blind spots in which a human can easily hide. Unfortunately, these blind spots are beneath the bottoms of their feet.
trans-unit.target: 很幸运地，山丘巨人有著可让人类轻易躲藏的大盲点；但很不幸地，这些盲点是位于他们的脚底板下。

trans-unit.source: Hurloon Minotaur
trans-unit.target: 夏浓族牛头怪

trans-unit.source: The minotaurs of the Hurloon Mountains are known for their love of battle. They are also known for their hymns to the dead, sung for friend and foe alike. These hymns can last for days, filling the mountain valleys with their low, haunting sounds.
trans-unit.target: 夏浓山的牛头怪因喜好战争闻名，而他们不分敌我地为死者所唱的赞美诗，也相当闻名。这些诗歌可以持续数天，整个山谷都充满它们低沈缭绕的声音。

trans-unit.source: Imposing Visage
trans-unit.target: 欺敌的外貌

trans-unit.source: With the horrible mask, Lagfrak the Low terrorized the countryside. But then he met Il-Chunt, the mask's model . . . .
trans-unit.target: 卑下的拉格弗拉特藉著恐怖面具造成居民的恐惧，但之后他遇到了伊·强特，也就是面具的原形……
trans-unit.note: 简中第五版缺失了99张牌，这些牌仅出现在繁中第五版中。

trans-unit.source: "Yes, I think 'toast' is an appropriate description."\n—Jaya Ballard, task mage

trans-unit.source: "Some have said there is no subtlety to destruction. You know what? They're dead."\n—Jaya Ballard, task mage
trans-unit.target: 「曾有人说破坏没什么巧妙之处。你知道怎么了？他们死啦。」 ～特务巫师雅亚巴拉得

trans-unit.source: Generations of genetic weeding have given rise to the deviously cowardly Ironclaw clan.
trans-unit.target: 几世代的天择，造就了间接且胆小的铁爪族。
trans-unit.note: 简中第五版缺失了99张牌，这些牌仅出现在繁中第五版中。

trans-unit.source: Jokulhaups
trans-unit.target: 大洪水

trans-unit.source: Bury all artifacts, creatures, and lands.
trans-unit.target: 埋葬所有神器、生物和地。

trans-unit.source: "The raging waters had swept away trees, bridges, and even houses. My healers had much work to do."\n—Halvor Arenson, Kjeldoran priest
trans-unit.target: 「巨浪吞没了树木、桥梁甚至马匹。我的医疗师们有得忙了。」 ～奇亚多朗祭司哈渥·阿雷森

trans-unit.source: Keldon Warlord
trans-unit.target: 凯尔顿军阀

trans-unit.source: CARDNAME has power and toughness each equal to the number of non-Wall creatures you control.
trans-unit.target: CARDNAME的力量和防御力等于你所操控之非墙生物的数目。

trans-unit.source: What if they threw a war, and *everybody* came?
trans-unit.target: 如果他们发动战争，并且所有人都杀过来，那会如何？

trans-unit.source: Mana Clash

trans-unit.source: You and target opponent each flip a coin. CARDNAME deals 1 damage to each player whose coin comes up tails. Repeat this process until both players' coins come up heads at the same time.
trans-unit.target: 你和目标玩家各掷一个硬币，CARDNAME对掷出反面的玩家造成1点伤害。重复此步骤，直到双方的硬币同时出现正面为止。
trans-unit.note: 简中第五版缺失了99张牌，这些牌仅出现在繁中第五版中。

trans-unit.source: Mana Flare
trans-unit.target: 法术力闪光

trans-unit.target: 任何玩家每横置一张地以产生法术力时，此地即额外产生一点同类型的法术力。

trans-unit.source: Manabarbs
trans-unit.target: 法术力倒钩

trans-unit.source: Whenever any player taps a land for mana, CARDNAME deals 1 damage to him or her.
trans-unit.target: 任何玩家每横置一张地以产生法术力时，CARDNAME即对他造成1点伤害。

trans-unit.source: Mons's Goblin Raiders
trans-unit.target: 芒氏鬼怪突击队

trans-unit.source: The intricate dynamics of Rundvelt goblin affairs are often confused with anarchy. The chaos, however, is the chaos of a thundercloud, and direction will sporadically and violently appear. Pashalik Mons and his raiders are the thunderhead that leads in the storm.
trans-unit.target: 温德汶鬼怪的杂乱事务往往被误认为毫无秩序。然而，这种混沌是一种雷云般的混沌，会突然激烈地显现出方向。帕沙力克将军芒氏和他的突击队便是为风暴带队的雷电。

trans-unit.source: Mountain Goat
trans-unit.target: 高山山羊

trans-unit.source: Mountainwalk (If defending player controls any mountains, this creature is unblockable.)
trans-unit.target: 山脉行者（若防御玩家操控任何山脉，则此生物不可被阻挡）

trans-unit.source: "Folklore has it that to capture a mountain goat is a sign of divine blessing. I just know it's a sign that dinner is on the way."\n—Klazina Jansdotter, Leader of the Order of the Sacred Torch
trans-unit.target: 「民间传说抓到高山山羊代表神的祝福。我嘛，只知道这代表晚餐有著落了。」 ～圣炬骑士团团长克拉席娜·强斯朵特

trans-unit.source: Orcish Artillery
trans-unit.target: 半兽人的大炮

trans-unit.source: oc\nT: CARDNAME deals 2 damage to target creature or player and 3 damage to you.
trans-unit.target: ocT：CARDNAME对目标生物或玩家造成2点伤害，并对你造成3点伤害。

trans-unit.source: In a rare display of ingenuity, the orcs invented an incredibly destructive weapon. Most orcish artillerists are those who dared criticize its effectiveness.
trans-unit.target: 半兽人发明了一种破坏力惊人的武器，表现出难得的设计才华。多数半兽人砲弹都是那些胆敢批评此武器效率的家伙。

trans-unit.source: Orcish Captain
trans-unit.target: 半兽人队长
trans-unit.note: 简中第五版缺失了99张牌，这些牌仅出现在繁中第五版中。

trans-unit.source: o1: Flip a coin; target opponent calls heads or tails while coin is in the air. If the flip ends up in your favor, target Orc gets +2/+0 until end of turn. Otherwise, that Orc gets -0/-2 until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: o1：掷一个硬币；目标对手在硬币未落下时决定正反面，若对手未猜中，目标半兽人得到+2/+0直到回合结束，否则该半兽人得到-0/-2直到回合结束。
trans-unit.note: 简中第五版缺失了99张牌，这些牌仅出现在繁中第五版中。

trans-unit.source: There's a chance to win every battle.
trans-unit.target: 每场战争都有些许机运。
trans-unit.note: 简中第五版缺失了99张牌，这些牌仅出现在繁中第五版中。

trans-unit.source: There is no natural disaster quite like orcish farming.

trans-unit.target: 一连串跳跃的火焰和嘶嘶作响的雷电，将神器工匠们的作品破坏得片甲不留。

trans-unit.target: 飞行 oR：+1/+0直到回合结束

trans-unit.source: While it's true most dragons are cruel, the Shivan dragon seems to take particular glee in the misery of others, often tormenting its victims much like a cat plays with a mouse before delivering the final blow.
trans-unit.target: 虽然龙大多残酷，但西瓦巨龙特别喜欢看到他人的不幸，常在给予最后一击前，先像猫玩弄老鼠般地虐待受害者。

trans-unit.source: After years of being bullied, Fergo reaped the benefits of his newfound strength: he never met a man he didn't want to fight.

trans-unit.source: Wall of Stone
trans-unit.target: 石墙

trans-unit.source: The ground itself lends its strength to these walls of living stone, which possess the stability of ancient mountains. These mighty bulwarks thwart ground-based troops, providing welcome relief for weary warriors who defend the land.
trans-unit.target: 大地本身将生命借与活石之墙，使之保有远古山脉般的稳定性。这些雄伟的堡垒阻挠了陆基部队，使守护此大地的战士们，在疲劳时有了栖息之处。

trans-unit.source: Don't try to outrun one of Dominaria's grizzlies; it'll catch you, knock you down, and eat you. Of course, you could run up a tree. In that case you'll get a nice view before it knocks the tree down and eats you.

trans-unit.resname: 5ED·392 | Obelisk of Undoing | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: o6, oc\nT: Return target permanent you control and own to your hand.
trans-unit.target: o6，ocT：将目标由你所拥有且由你所操控的永久物移回你的手上。

trans-unit.source: The Battle of Tomakul taught Urza not to rely on fickle reinforcements.
trans-unit.target: 托玛库之役教导了克撒不要依赖不稳定的补给。

trans-unit.source: Ornithopter
trans-unit.target: 扑翼机

trans-unit.source: Flying
trans-unit.target: 飞行

trans-unit.source: "It has been my honor to improve on Thran's original design. Perhaps history will remember me in some small part for my work."\n—Urza, in his apprenticeship
trans-unit.target: 「能有机会改良索蓝的原设计是我的荣幸。也许历史会因为我的努力而记下一小笔功劳。」 ～克撒于他的学徒生涯

trans-unit.resname: 5ED·394 | Pentagram of the Ages | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Pentagram of the Ages
trans-unit.target: 远古的五星仪

trans-unit.resname: 5ED·394 | Pentagram of the Ages | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: o4, oc\nT: Prevent all damage to you from one source. Treat further damage from that source normally.
trans-unit.target: o4，ocT：为你防止所有来自单一来源的伤害。此来源之后造成的伤害仍正常处理。

trans-unit.resname: 5ED·394 | Pentagram of the Ages | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: A mirror, a shield, a promise, a great distance, and a kind word—five ways to avoid harm.
trans-unit.target: 一面镜子、一个盾、一份承诺、一段够远的距离，以及一句亲切的话～这是避免受伤的五种方法。

trans-unit.source: Primal Clay
trans-unit.target: 未塑型的黏土

trans-unit.source: When you play CARDNAME, choose one—CARDNAME is a 2/2 artifact creature with flying; or CARDNAME is a 3/3 artifact creature; or CARDNAME is a 1/6 artifact creature that counts as a Wall.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进场时，选择一项～CARDNAME是一只2/2且具飞行异能的神器生物；或者CARDNAME是一只3/3的神器生物；或者CARDNAME是一只1/6且被视为墙的神器生物。

trans-unit.source: Rod of Ruin
trans-unit.target: 遗迹棍棒

trans-unit.source: o3, oc\nT: CARDNAME deals 1 damage to target creature or player.
trans-unit.target: o3，ocT：CARDNAME对目标生物或玩家造成1点伤害。

trans-unit.source: Serpent Generator
trans-unit.target: 毒蛇生产机
trans-unit.note: 简中第五版缺失了99张牌，这些牌仅出现在繁中第五版中。

trans-unit.source: o4, oc\nT: Put a Poison Snake token into play. Treat this token as a 1/1 artifact creature. If any Poison Snake damages any player, he or she gets a poison counter. If any player has ten or more poison counters, he or she loses the game.
trans-unit.target: o4，ocT：放置一毒蛇衍生物进场。将此衍生物视为1/1的神器生物。若任何毒蛇衍生物伤害任何玩家，则该玩家得一中毒指示物。若任何玩家得十个以上中毒指示物，则输掉此盘游戏。
trans-unit.note: 简中第五版缺失了99张牌，这些牌仅出现在繁中第五版中。

trans-unit.source: Shapeshifter
trans-unit.target: 变形侠

trans-unit.source: CARDNAME has total power and toughness of 7, divided any way you choose, though neither can be more than 7.\nWhen you play CARDNAME, choose its power and toughness.\nDuring your upkeep, choose CARDNAME's power and toughness.
trans-unit.target: CARDNAME的力量及防御力总合为7，你可以用任何方式分配，但两者皆不可大于7。 当CARDNAME进场时，你要决定CARDNAME的力量及防御力。 在你的维持阶段中，决定CARDNAME的力量及防御力。

trans-unit.source: Skull Catapult
trans-unit.target: 骷髅投石器
trans-unit.note: 简中第五版缺失了99张牌，这些牌仅出现在繁中第五版中。

trans-unit.source: o1, oc\nT, Sacrifice a creature: CARDNAME deals 2 damage to target creature or player.
trans-unit.target: o1，ocT，牺牲一只生物：CARDNAME对目标生物或玩家造成2点伤害。
trans-unit.note: 简中第五版缺失了99张牌，这些牌仅出现在繁中第五版中。

trans-unit.source: "Let any who doubt the evil of using the ancient devices look at this infernal machine. What manner of fiend would design such a sadistic device?"\n—Sorine Relicbane, Soldevi heretic
trans-unit.target: 「让那些觉得使用古代设备不是罪过的人来看看这个炼狱般的机器吧。是哪个恶魔竟能设计出这种虐人的器具？」 ～索地威的异教徒，寻宝家索琳
trans-unit.note: 简中第五版缺失了99张牌，这些牌仅出现在繁中第五版中。

trans-unit.source: Soul Net
trans-unit.target: 亡灵之网

trans-unit.source: o1: Gain 1 life. Use this ability only when a creature is put into any graveyard from play and only once for each such creature.
trans-unit.target: o1：获得1点生命。你只可在当生物由场上被放置入任何坟墓场的时候使用此异能，且只可对每只这样的生物使用一次

trans-unit.source: Tawnos's Weaponry
trans-unit.target: 达硌士的兵器

trans-unit.source: You may choose not to untap CARDNAME during your untap phase.\no2, oc\nT: Target creature gets +1/+1 as long as CARDNAME remains tapped.
trans-unit.target: 你可选择在你的重置阶段中不重置CARDNAME。 o2，ocT：只要CARDNAME持续被横置，目标生物便得到+1/+1。

trans-unit.source: When war machines became too costly, Tawnos's weaponry replaced them.
trans-unit.target: 当武器变得过于昂贵时，达硌士的兵器便取代了它们。

trans-unit.source: The Hive
trans-unit.target: 蜂箱

trans-unit.source: o5, oc\nT: Put a Wasp token into play. Treat this token as a 1/1 artifact creature with flying.
trans-unit.target: o5，ocT：放置一个黄蜂衍生物进场。将此衍生物视为一个1/1且具飞行异能的神器生物。

trans-unit.source: Mouths and wings beyond numbering, but a single mind to guide them.
trans-unit.target: 数不清的利嘴与薄翅，由同一个精神所导引。

trans-unit.target: 骨头御座

trans-unit.target: o1：获得1点生命。你只能在当黑色咒语被成功施放时使用此异能，且只可对每个这样的咒语使用一次。

trans-unit.note: 简中第五版缺失了99张牌，这些牌仅出现在繁中第五版中。

trans-unit.source: During your upkeep, put a time counter on CARDNAME.\no1, oc\nT, Sacrifice CARDNAME: CARDNAME deals to each creature and player an amount of damage equal to the number of time counters on CARDNAME.
trans-unit.target: 在你的维持阶段中，放置一个计时指示物于CARDNAME上。 o1，ocT，牺牲CARDNAME：CARDNAME对所有玩家及生物造成与在CARDNAME上之计时指示物数量等量的伤害。
trans-unit.note: 简中第五版缺失了99张牌，这些牌仅出现在繁中第五版中。

trans-unit.target: 克撒的复仇者

trans-unit.source: o0: -1/-1 and your choice of banding, flying, first strike, or trample until end of turn
trans-unit.target: 0：-1/-1，同时你可选择此生物获得结合、飞行、先攻或践踏其中一个异能直到回合结束。
trans-unit.note: 简中第五版缺失了99张牌，这些牌仅出现在繁中第五版中。

trans-unit.source: Unable to settle on just one design, Urza decided to create one versatile being.
trans-unit.target: 克撒无法满足于单一功能的设计，因此决定要制作一种泛用的造物。
trans-unit.note: 简中第五版缺失了99张牌，这些牌仅出现在繁中第五版中。

trans-unit.source: Urza's Bauble
trans-unit.target: 克撒的饰品
trans-unit.note: 简中第五版缺失了99张牌，这些牌仅出现在繁中第五版中。

trans-unit.source: oc\nT, Sacrifice CARDNAME: Choose a card at random from target player's hand and look at that card. Draw a card at the beginning of the next turn.
trans-unit.target: ocT，牺牲CARDNAME：随机由目标对手的手牌中选择一张，并且检视该牌。你在下回合开始时抽一张牌。
trans-unit.note: 简中第五版缺失了99张牌，这些牌仅出现在繁中第五版中。

trans-unit.source: Even the most conservative generals revised their tactics after the Battle of Sarinth, during which a handful of peasant-pikemen held off a trio of rampaging craw wurms.
trans-unit.target: 即使是最守旧的将军，在看到沙林斯之役中，一小群农民矛兵便可击退一群狂暴的巨爪亚龙的景况后，也都修改了战略。

trans-unit.source: Players cannot untap more than one land during their untap phases.

「一旦冬天降临以后 就不会心甘情愿离去 她冰般轻触与温和爱抚 使空气沈睡于她的冷酷中」 ～艾琳·可拉伦，「迟溶的雪」
